spiritsExplanation:
The metadata for the workout video indicates a strong "High-Energy & Intense" spirit due to terms like "intense lower abs workout," "push to the LIMIT," and an intensity level of 9/10. The structure of 30 seconds of exercise with only 10 seconds of rest also supports this classification, aiming to keep the heart rate elevated and increase fat burn, scoring a 0.7 in this category.

The "Flow & Rhythm" spirit is less pronounced but present, as the workout is described as "all standing" and "low impact," suggesting a certain fluidity and music-driven pacing that aligns somewhat with this spirit, earning it a score of 0.4.

The "Structured & Disciplined" spirit is evident with specific time protocols (30 seconds exercise, 10 seconds rest) and the suggestion to maintain a healthy nutrition plan, indicating discipline and precision in the workout approach. This structure and technical precision earn a score of 0.5.

The "Soothing & Restorative" spirit is notably absent, as intense exercise and calorie burn are the focus rather than recovery or relaxation. "Sport & Agility" and "Outdoor & Adventure" are not relevant given the indoor, non-sports specific nature of the routines.
